QuestData.Title: Demoniac Vessel
QuestData.Description: We need a way to get Wormthorn's attention. Something to break him out of his trance. Something that's guaranteed to work.$b$bThe few types of wildlife that managed to make a foothold in the Tainted Forest are, without a doubt, affected by the land's latent energies. Your task is to collect their body parts and find a way to combine them into a vessel. If Wormthorn's trance is druidic, or even if it is demonic, a large enough vessel of tainted animal flesh should be able to break it.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill the Tainted Black Bears, Tainted Nightstalkers, and Tainted Screechers in the Tainted Forest, and try to assemble their parts into a Demoniac Vessel.
QuestData.CompletionText: Shayana's plan is a good one. Do you have the vessel, $n?
QuestData.RewardText: <Mayor Charlton Connisport looks warily at the device you've assembled.>$b$bVery well, $n. We have what we need to break Marl's trance and put an end to both him and his experiment.
